# Realclick

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="realclick"
  data-mcode="d290anI3MTEyMDAwMDFfMTU3Ng=="
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, please contact [Realclick](http://www.realclick.co.kr/)

Supported parameters:

-   `data-mcode`
